description: A React component for exporting a draft, either by downloading as a text file or saving to a Supabase database.

methods.name: ExportPDF({ draft, meta })
methods.description: React functional component for exporting a draft as a text file or saving it to a database.

methods.name: saveToSupabase
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the draft and associated meta information to the Supabase database.

methods.name: downloadText
methods.description: Creates a downloadable text file containing the draft content.
